dl.dd:
A comma-separated list of event names that the command updater will update upon. If this attribute is not specified, or you set it to the value '*', all events are valid. Valid events are listed below, or you can use your own events. You can send a custom event by calling the XULMeth2("UpdateCommands") method of the command dispatcher.
focus: Occurs when the focused element changes.
select: Occurs when the selected text changed.
clipboard: Occurs when the clipboard is changed.
undo: Occurs when the undo buffer is changed.
